ooC: 

Are there any Maximals present at the this battle?

May I suggest that Switchblade brings it outside, and accidentally 
triggers an effect which creats a laser beam which targets Tyrael, 
but hits Megatron as well since he and Tyrael are fighting. After 
that, one of the still functioning Maximals/Tripreds, breaks the 
matrix like setup of the cube, thus breaking it into its pieces. 
From there, the pieces could get scattered around the world, or they 
could get divided up between the factions.

Since this affects everyone, ooC replies to it over the messageboard 
are quite acceptable, and are encouraged.
